summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1445, for the improvement of 2nd Avenue in the City of Seattle, from Virginia Street to Cedar Street, by installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line on each side of said avenues, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system, under Ordinance No. 15608 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
